steps.title: Sample cartoon chicken.
steps.content: Sample cartoon chicken.

steps.title: Make a small circle.
steps.content: Make a small circle.

steps.title: Create an oval within that.
steps.content: Create an oval within that.

steps.title: Draw a triangle joined with another for the beak-guide.
steps.content: Draw a triangle joined with another for the beak-guide.

steps.title: Make four ovals of different sizes on top of the head for the comb.
steps.content: Make four ovals of different sizes on top of the head for the comb.

steps.title: Join two straight lines from the head for the neck.
steps.content: Join two straight lines from the head for the neck.

steps.title: Create a big oval at the bottom of the neck –lines for the body.
steps.content: Create a big oval at the bottom of the neck –lines for the body.

steps.title: Within that create a smaller oval for the wing.
steps.content: Within that create a smaller oval for the wing.

steps.title: Make an angular box for the tail overlapping the right edge of the oval.
steps.content: Make an angular box for the tail overlapping the right edge of the oval.

steps.title: Attach straight lines from the bottom of the body-oval and extend digits from them.
steps.content: Attach straight lines from the bottom of the body-oval and extend digits from them.

steps.title: Make all the detailed strokes.
steps.content: Make all the detailed strokes.

steps.title: Erase guides.
steps.content: Erase guides.

steps.title: Color the chicken.
steps.content: Color the chicken.

steps.title: Sample simple chicken.
steps.content: Sample simple chicken.

steps.title: Draw a small oval for the head.
steps.content: Draw a small oval for the head.

steps.title: Make another much bigger oval for the body.
steps.content: Make another much bigger oval for the body.

steps.title: Join the two ovals with a straight lines.
steps.content: Join the two ovals with a straight lines.

steps.title: Join three regular lines with each other for tail.
steps.content: Join three regular lines with each other for tail.

steps.title: Attach a small beak to the edge of the oval on the top by joining two straight lines.
steps.content: Attach a small beak to the edge of the oval on the top by joining two straight lines.

steps.title: Make a squeezed inverted ‘D’ on top of the head-oval.
steps.content: Make a squeezed inverted ‘D’ on top of the head-oval.

steps.title: Then draw a tiny oval for the eye.
steps.content: Then draw a tiny oval for the eye.

steps.title: Extend a couple of straight line for the legs.
steps.content: Extend a couple of straight line for the legs.

steps.title: Create four lines from the base of the leg-lines for guides to the digits.
steps.content: Create four lines from the base of the leg-lines for guides to the digits.

steps.title: Get back to the body and make a modest horizontal oval for the wing.
steps.content: Get back to the body and make a modest horizontal oval for the wing.

steps.title: Draw every detail of the chicken based on the above guides.
steps.content: Draw every detail of the chicken based on the above guides.

steps.title: Erase away all guide lines.
steps.content: Erase away all guide lines.

steps.title: Color the chicken and apply shades accordingly.
steps.content: Color the chicken and apply shades accordingly.

steps.title: Sample traditional chicken.
steps.content: Sample traditional chicken.

steps.title: Let's start with the head.
steps.content: Let's start with the head. Draw a circle and a curvy triangle for the beak. Draw an oval for the wattle and comb. Draw guidelines.

steps.title: Add in details for the head.
steps.content: Add in details for the head. Draw a circle for the eye. A line for the mouth and add in color separations.

steps.title: Now let's move on to the body.
steps.content: Now let's move on to the body. Draw a curvy oval for the neck. A circle and oval for the body. Draw a curvy triangle as basis for the tail and another one for the wings.

steps.title: Draw 2 ovals for each leg and add in its feet.
steps.content: Draw 2 ovals for each leg and add in its feet.

steps.title: Sketch in details like feathers and such.
steps.content: Sketch in details like feathers and such.

steps.title: Outline our chicken and erase guidelines.
steps.content: Outline our chicken and erase guidelines.

steps.title: Color it up and we're done!
steps.content: Color it up and we're done!

steps.title: Draw a diagonal oval.
steps.content: Draw a diagonal oval.

steps.title: Next, draw 2 small circles beneath the oval that are half as long as the oval away from the oval.
steps.content: Next, draw 2 small circles beneath the oval that are half as long as the oval away from the oval. This will create the body of the chicken.

steps.title: Create a head.
steps.content: Create a head.

steps.title: Draw a tail going upwards and away from the body.
steps.content: Draw a tail going upwards and away from the body.

steps.title: Add details.
steps.content: Add details.

steps.title: Color.
steps.content: Color.
